# Basic Plot in R

```{r}
height <- c(145, 167, 176, 180, 190)
weight <- c(51, 63, 64, 40, 55)

plot(height, weight)
plot(height, weight, type = "l")
plot(height, weight, type = "p")
plot(height, weight, type = "o")
plot(height, weight, type = "b")
```
